definition: to handle matters with ease (idiom)/to hold one's own
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
surname Fu
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
as/as if/such as

sentences.english: Hopefully, they can see me play.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望能看到我能应付自如。

sentences.english: No matter how complicated the situation was, he could cope with it successfully.
sentences.chinese: 不论情况多么复杂，他都能应付自如。

sentences.english: In fact, huge, integrated oil companies can adjust to the volatility in the market.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，巨型的多业态石油公司对市场动荡应付自如。

sentences.english: You have to mature and ripen enough to handle that level of relationship.
sentences.chinese: 你必须得成熟，成熟到可以应付自如这种关系。

sentences.english: After a long struggle, she gained control of the business.
sentences.chinese: 经过长期努力，她在业务上已经能够应付自如。

sentences.english: For those occasions, a white dress shirt will do the trick.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，一件白衬衫便可应付自如。

sentences.english: It is a difficult task, but I'm sure he'll rise to the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 这是个艰巨的任务，不过我相信他能应付自如。

definition: handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
handling any occasion smoothly (idiom); equal to any situation
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
see 泰然處之|泰然处之[tai4 ran2 chu3 zhi1]
to handle the situation calmly (idiom)/unruffled/to treat the situation lightly
able to reply quickly and fluently (idiom); having a ready answer
calm/unruffled
cool and collected (idiom); showing no sign of nerves/perfectly composed
to talk and laugh as though nothing had happened/to remain cheerful (despite a crisis)
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
to deal with/to cope
to respond fluently/to answer smartly
to operate (a machine etc) with ease
not to pose a problem for sb/cannot stump sb
to be successful in every endeavor
